string.text: The Old Realms Manual has been moved! {newline} {newline} {newline} All information regarding TOR can either be found in a live maintained Google document or the attached PDF in the Core Modules folder. {newline} {newline} The PDF Manual can be found under: {newline} {newline} Non Steam Workshop version: {newline} ...\Mount & Blade II Bannerlord\Modules\TOR_Core {newline} {newline} Steam Workshop version:{newline} Navigate to the 'The Old Realms Core Module' page, there will be a link to the manual document. {newline} {newline} {newline} Note the most updated version of the manual is available online, and may contain more information than the attached PDF document! A link to the online doc is provided in the PDF.{newline} {newline} {newline} You can also join our Discord channel for more information, the link can be found in the PDF. {newline} {newline} {newline} {newline}
